game.name: Pony Ice Cream Cone
game.description:
Do you have intense craving for ice creams? Are you the lover of pony games for kids? If your answer is yes for the both questions, you have reached at the right place. Join Pony Ice Cream Cone and allow yourself to make your dream come true. In this one of the best cooking games, you will be able to fulfil your ice cream passion. It will be amazing to learn how to create the pony style ice cream cone and serve it to your friends to make them feel happy. Of course, your friends will be highly thankful to you. 
You have to put your ultimate cooking skills to test in this one of the best games for girls. After completing your ice cream, make sure to fill them with delicious and colourful creams. You can feel free to decorate your ice cream cone as per your taste buds in this free online decoration game. It will definitely be a great fun to play the role of a cooking master. Collect all the useful ingredients displayed on the screen and get ready to prepare the cones by following the instructions properly!
This cool HTML5 game can be played on PC using your mouse, while exploring it on your mobile phone is pretty possible by tapping with your finger on the screen. Avoid making a mistake while creating your favourite combination during your cooking adventure! Invite your friends to go on a real cooking challenge and have limitless fun! You can enjoy more games that feature cooking on our website for free without installing them.
